jobs_results.title: IOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Idexcel s client is looking for a Job Title: iOS Developer @ Vienna, VA/Pensacola, FL/ San Diego, CA on Contract or Full-time basis

Job Title: Mid- Senior iOS Developer

Location: Vienna, VA/Pensacola, FL/ San Diego, CA

Duration: Long Term

Top 3 Desired Skills:
• Mentorship Ability
• Strong Communication Skills
• Technical Proficiency

Skills Required:
• Experience developing native iOS applications written in Swift using the latest versions of the Xcode IDE
• Able to work in a collaborative environment leveraging Agile software development methodologies
• Actively engages in the iOS developer community in order to gain knowledge and expertise to apply in the delivery of future solutions
• Adheres with coding best practices around security, accessibility, adds emphasis on testing / testable code and design patterns such as MVVM, and/or MVC.
• Familiar working with source code management and development collaboration tools for issue tracking and requirements documentation like Azure DevOps
• Familiarity with modern frameworks like SwiftUI and Combine
• Strong grasp of source control tools (Git, Git Submodules)
• Some level of comfortability using Terminal or some other *nix shell.

About IDEXCEL, INC Idexcel is a global staffing and IT services organization, with a mission to bring great people and great organizations together. Our diverse client base represents a wide range of industries, including technology, telecom, insurance, healthcare, manufacturing, banking & financial services, food & commodities trading and federal organizations. Our teams of experienced recruiters directly work with client companies seeking exceptional people to help with their business initiatives.

Idexcel, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, disability, military status, national origin or any other characteristic protected under federal, state, or applicable local law.

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: Experience developing native iOS applications written in Swift using the latest versions of the Xcode IDE
Able to work in a collaborative environment leveraging Agile software development methodologies
Actively engages in the iOS developer community in order to gain knowledge and expertise to apply in the delivery of future solutions
Adheres with coding best practices around security, accessibility, adds emphasis on testing / testable code and design patterns such as MVVM, and/or MVC
Familiar working with source code management and development collaboration tools for issue tracking and requirements documentation like Azure DevOps
Familiarity with modern frameworks like SwiftUI and Combine
Strong grasp of source control tools (Git, Git Submodules)
Some level of comfortability using Terminal or some other *nix shell

jobs_results.title: Lead iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
About the position

The iOS Lead position is a critical role for a dedicated Senior iOS Developer with over 10 years of experience in the field. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying high-quality iOS applications that provide intuitive and seamless user experiences. This role requires a deep understanding of iOS development, particularly with Swift, SwiftUI, Objective-C, and various iOS frameworks. The candidate should be passionate about building scalable applications and continuously exploring innovative features to enhance the user experience. In this position, the iOS Lead will be expected to implement applications that utilize new messaging frameworks, payment gateways, open banking, and mobile design libraries. The role demands a proactive approach to problem-solving and a commitment to delivering high-quality software solutions. The iOS Lead will work closely with other team members to ensure that the applications meet the highest standards of performance and usability. This is a freelance contract position, and the candidate must be prepared to work in a dynamic environment where adaptability and creativity are essential.

Responsibilities
• Design, develop, and deploy iOS applications.
,
• Create intuitive and seamless user experiences.
,
• Implement new messaging frameworks and payment gateways.
,
• Utilize open banking and mobile design libraries in application development.
,
• Continuously explore innovative features for modern iOS development.

Requirements
• Over 10 years of experience in iOS application development.
,
• Proficiency in Swift, SwiftUI, Objective-C, and various iOS frameworks.
,
• Strong focus on creating high-quality, scalable applications.
,
• Experience with implementing messaging frameworks and payment gateways.

Nice-to-haves

Benefits

jobs_results.title: Mobile iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Come work for an industry leader in a rewarding career helping others! We have an exciting hybrid opportunity for a .NET/Mobile Developer who will implement important digital and mobile initiatives. If you are experienced in mobile development and want to be involved in the design and development of applications and services that directly benefit our employees, customers, and company, come join our team at Terminix!

The ideal candidate will bring expertise in Swift iOS application development, along with proficiency in web services using .NET and SQL. We are looking for someone who is responsible, conscientious, organized, and self-motivated who has strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a collaborative environment with limited supervision.

Main job functions:
• Develop, maintain, and support an iOS application built in Swift, designed primarily for iPad use.
• Integrate and manage web services using .NET technologies to ensure seamless communication between platforms.
• Work with SQL databases for application data storage, retrieval, and reporting needs.
• Contribute to web application development tasks using C#.
• Provide support and troubleshooting for the iOS application and associated backend services.
• Experience writing and consuming RESTful services

Required skills to be successful in this role include:
• Proficiency in Swift programming with strong understanding of iOS SDK, Xcode, and related development tools.
• Hands-on experience developing and supporting web services using .NET.
• Proficiency in SQL, including writing and optimizing queries.
• Familiarity with REST APIs, JSON, XML, and server-side integrations for mobile apps.
• Experience with version control systems such as Git and Azure DevOps.

Additional experience that would be helpful:
• Familiarity with IBM System i and/or DB2.
• Experience in optimizing applications for performance and scalability. Experience with web development using C# and JavaScript.

What we offer:
• Rewarding pay
• Growth opportunities
• Stable and growing industry
• Health, dental, vision, life, & supplemental insurance
• Paid time off
• 401(k) Retirement plan with employer matching
• Incentives and awards
• Family atmosphere
• Free pest control & discounted termite services
• Flexible, hybrid schedule
• and more!

Terminix is a locally owned and operated company who has provided pest control services to residents and businesses in the Triad area of North Carolina for over 90 years. As a franchise of Terminix International, the world's largest pest control company, we are proud to be a family-owned franchise managed by four generations of the same family.

Terminix is a recognized industry leader and offers stability and a rewarding career to our team of talented professionals. We are passionate about what we do for our customers and our communities we live and work in. If you are looking for worthwhile work, we have a great opportunity for you and would love to hear from you today!

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

jobs_results.description:
Additional Details :
• Resource will need to be local to the Dallas, TX area and able to come into office. This resource must have a minimum of 2 yrs experience, not looking for a beginner.

Top skills:
• Knowledge of Swift & Objective C.
• Worked on different tools like Junit, Jenkins, Jira and Github to maintain software version control, pull requests for committed codes.
• Experience integrating applications with RESTful web services using different libraries like Retrofit, Volley and parsing JSON.

Job description:
• Development of iOS applications and their integration with back-end services.
• You will be working alongside other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure.
• Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and the creation of quality products is essential.
Skills:
• Expert in iPhone SDK, SQLite Database, iPad, X Code, XML
• JSON Parsing, Location services, Social networking integration like Facebook ,twitter
• Expert in Objective C programming & Swift 3, Web service and Parsing JSON/XML.
• Expertise in iPhone development, including implementing applications with standard iPhone/ iPad UI components, creating custom UI.

Required Skills : XML
Additional Skills : iOS Developer

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

3MK Software Solutions is the leading software service soltions provider and IT Staffing Supplier company, outsourcing and complex implementation services for the business across different functional areas and technologies with a core focus on software development and web designing development and GIS Software solutions and services. Our team is our core strength, we have selected the most skilled and talented specialists from the IT industry, and we continuously invest in developing their capabilities. The core management has many years of experience and has successfully leaded complex projects for major corporate in the field of healthcare, communication, retail and finance. During the term of these projects, the team had needed to develop an advanced implementation methodology.

Job Description

Here are some more details on the roles -

iOS & Android roles - For both roles, they need someone who is proficient in one of them but has knowledge of the other as well. The folks would have to consult cross-platform teams to develop similar functionality for both platforms, as such they need to understand how the other technology works. So, an iOS candidate would have to know some Android and vice-versa. For both skills, some security experience is a huge plus. Specifically for Andorid, Knox experience is a huge plus.

For iOS - It's more user experience related.

For Android - It's more application development.

Job description

iOS Senior Software Engineers research, design, test, implement, and maintain iOS applications to meet client needs. They use a Objective-C/Swift languages and various iOS development tools, working in teams with other IT professionals, or alone. They are expected to work with Business Analysts, Subject Matter Experts, and other project stakeholders to implement application software based on varying levels of written requirements and verbal input. Implementation includes design, coding, unit testing, delivery, and source code management.

Senior Engineers are also expected to demonstrate their value to the organization by mentoring other team members as they learn and grow, take ownership and responsibility not only for your deliverables, but for the entire application and its use, and to find a balance between achieving software excellence and delivering working code.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

Involved with all phases of mobile app development from initial concepts, through design, development, testing and deployment

Responsible for development and support of native iOS applications

Develop and architect iOS applications across multiple releases (Objective C, soon Swift).

Work within SCRUM agile process with other stakeholders (Product Owners, XD design, Quality Engineers) as well as across organization to balance creative objectives with business needs and technical requirements

Lead best practices by producing high quality, documented and testable code

QUALIFICATIONS

4+ years of successful experience as a developer for native iOS application(s).

Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.

Experience in utilizing multi-threading technologies to create highly responsive data intensive applications

Extensive knowledge of CoreData framework, esp. in multi-threading environments

Good knowledge on other iOS frameworks, especially for handling Contacts and Media

Good knowledge with web service architecture, protocols, security and data formats (Ex. REST, OAuth, JSON, etc.) and implementation patterns on iOS platform including both Apple and 3rd party tools/frameworks

Deep understanding of both manual and ARC memory management practices

Strong understanding of OS UI guidelines.

Strong handle of xCode profiling tools

Nice to have: Experience working with SCRUM and/or Agile development environments

Nice to have: Experience working in cross-functional teams

Strong written and oral communication skills, ability to multi-task, establish priorities and meet tight deadlines

Excellent conceptual, analytical and problem-solving abilities

BS in Computer Science or related field and 5 years of experience or Master's Degree equivalent.

Qualifications

SCRUM and/or Agile development environments

Additional Information

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Kollasoft is a robust and innovative technology company based in Arizona, US. We impart innovation and drive change by offer of end-to-end technology services and products, and complex technology solutions. It is integral to Kollasoft’s DNA to understand customer’s needs and deliver services as per the right business model.

We have a balanced strategy when it comes to offering technology support to local and global businesses. If our IT services are about understanding and listening to clients, and offering bespoke solutions within timelines; product development is all about innovation, IP and “content”; and our IT training and staffing activities aim to ensure quality work output.

Job Description

This is a contract to hire position

Need EAD ,GC or USC for this position

Qualifications

3+ iOS mobile application development experience

Unit Testing

Experience with tools such as: Jira; DeviceAnyWhere; TestFlight, Xcode

Strong knowledge of the internals of the iOS platform: networking, accessibility, rendering, native controls, security, data management

Strong knowledge of several versions of iOS (including latest and upcoming beta), supported features, drawbacks, bugs, benefits, etc.

Additional Information

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer - Remote (Only Mexico)
jobs_results.description:
About the position

The iOS Developer position at Orion Innovation involves creating technical designs and implementing features for the iOS app. The role requires collaboration with various teams to deliver innovative features and utilizes Agile methodologies for continuous improvement.

Responsibilities
• Create technical designs for and implement features in the iOS app.
,
• Design and implement framework components and integrate with various SDKs and mobile platforms.
,
• Collaborate with software engineers, PM, QA, and UX to design and deliver unique, innovative new features that delight our customers.
,
• Participate in the team process, using Agile methodologies to adapt and continuously improve.

Requirements
• 6+ years of experience programming in Swift.
,
• Experience using SwiftUI to declare and implement user interfaces.
,
• Contributed to an app that is available in the Apple App Store.
,
• Skilled at investigating issues and solving problems.
,
• Experience with common source code control systems (e.g. git).
,
• Strong written and verbal communication skills.
,
• Proficient in English.
,
• Degree in Computer Science or a related discipline OR relevant experience.

Nice-to-haves

Benefits

Contributed to an app that is available in the Apple App Store

Strong written and verbal communication skills
Proficient in English

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
About The Role

The role of the iOS Developer is supporting multiple new IT initiatives and developing apps which are eye catching, user friendly, accessible, and good looking yet simple and uniquely built. Creating and maintaining advanced application for our exchange to the iOS platform, having the ability to balance high response, stable and efficient code with attractive and functional aesthetics. Also, working together with cross-functional teams to define, design and ship new features. Troubleshooting issues and bugs and improving application performance.

Role:- iOS Developer | Experience: 3 – 5 years | Opening(s): 1 | Locations: Delhi / Mohali

Education

Bachelors or master’s degree in Computer Science or any other IT correlated technical field along with 3-5 years of relevant work experience. Should have the in-depth knowledge of all the phases of software development lifecycle which includes but not restricted to gathering and analysing user/business system requirements, responding to outages and creating application system models. Should be competent in the field of web technologies, iOS frameworks, Swift or Objective-C, HTML5 and programming languages. Ideally, should possess excellent communication skills, proactiveness, positive attitude and team-player capabilities.

Sounds like you?

Passionate and obsession with technology along with deep familiarity & knowledge of iOS, iPhone, X-code and Mac with Objective-C/Swift, Cocoa Touch, frameworks and libraries. Have excellent problem solving/debugging skills who love to take up technical challenges & is up to date with the current state of the iOS development ecosystem.

What Do We Expect
• Proficient with Swift 3.0 or Objective-C
• Familiarity with Push notifications, Deep Linking and Core Location
• Experienced in working with data parsing forms such as XML and JSON, to dynamically display data on iPhone/iPad.
• Understanding full mobile development cycle
• Experience using RESTful Web Service APIs
• Have built and published iOS apps on the App Store in the past
• Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc.
• Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
• Be a part of the team in terms of decision making, product direction, and vision.

What Would You Be Doing
• Architect, design and build advanced applications for the iOS platform
• Familiarity with objective C/Swift, Cocoa Touch and working with external frameworks and libraries
• Translate requirements and mock-ups into fully functional features
• Collaborating with teams to define, design, and ship new features provide estimates on development cycles
• Familiarity with Push notifications, Deep Linking and Core Location
• Experienced in working with data parsing forms such as XML and JSON, to dynamically display data on iPhone/iPad.
• Leveraged native iOS features (Push Notifications and Local notification, Animations, GPS, Settings, Contacts).
